pkgmetadata.longdescription: # YunXiao APIAn API tool for YunXiao Education Institution Management System.# Copyright StatementYunXiao software is owned by XiaoGuanJia. This project is for learning purposes only. If there is any infringement, please contact me to delete.# Contactadmin@sqkkyzx.com# API Endpoint## V3- ### arranges_query` ` | Parameter | Description ||-----------|-------------|- ### campus_query`
